data.title: What a flight
data.text: An amazing feeling. Everyone wants to feel what it is like to fly like a bird. Great trip and no crash.

data.title: Mr and  mrs king
data.text: Beautiful  place and  very detailed. I was amazed  at how much this place had  to offer, and  the price wasn't  that  cut throat,

data.title: Fun for All
data.text: I attended a Birthday Party here for my cousin. it provides loads of entertainment for the enter family and friends.

data.title: awesome experience
data.text: iFly is absolutely amazing.  the staff is great and super professional.  you won't regret spending the money.

owner_response.author: iFLY V, Public Relations Manager at iFLY Va Beach Indoor Skydiving, responded to this review
owner_response.text: Thank you for the kind words!! Please come back and see us!!
owner_response.title: Owner Response

data.title: Amazing experience!!
data.text: Our group ranged in age from 9-71. We all had a great experience! We did the high fly upgrade and it was worth it! We didn't upgrade our helmets, but wish we had done so. We really enjoyed the experience and it was unlike anything we've ever done before. I would gladly go again and again!! Everyone in the group truly enjoyed the experience!

data.title: High Flying Excitement
data.text:
My wife and I loved our experience at iFly in Virginia Beach, VA. 
We went on a Friday afternoon at 4:30 and it wasn't crowded at all (granted it is off-season). We got great instructions from our flight instructor and flying indoors was a blast. All the fun of skydiving without the feeling of falling! I highly, highly recommend it!

data.title: Fun and professional
data.text: Was very exciting...did a great job...very professional....just know it's only 2 minutes  and cost $60

data.title: Great experience
data.text: I surprised my husband with this experience for his birthday.  He reluctantly went along with my plan and absolutely loved it.  We had a blast.

data.title: Had a fun time!
data.text: My husband and I decided to try this when Hurricane Hermine came through. We had a great experience and had a ton of fun. I wish we could have had some one on one time to actually learn how to move on our own but other than that it was a great time and a neat experience!

data.title: IFLY Virginia Beach center-Skydiving
data.text:
This was one of the best and most vivid experiences that we as a family had during our vacation at VB in July 2016. We wanted to make it super fun especially for kids so opted to buy sessions for them and just watch and take pics/videos. It was a Monday night -  no line at all, really nice staff giving us coupons for a few free pics and videos and it was something very minor (that I cannot even remember), which prompted that nice gesture. Stress free, smiling and friendly staff, instructor (one looked just like Tom Cruise in "Mission Impossible" when he copies files to the disk in the vault:)
Best part-I could not download pics using the coupon and when I called the number Cindy assured that she would call back once the issue was resolved. It was under an hour that all worked and I was thanking her over the phone! 
Highly recommend, I hear it is different at other locations. Will go myself next time too. It is short but worth trying.

Helen

data.title: Outstanding adventure!
data.text: The folks at iFly VA Beach are very professional and easy going.  They ensure everyone understands the safety rules and then they ensure everyone has a great time!  It is definitely something anyone can do (as long as you weigh less than 250 Lbs).

data.title: Minutes to learn, so much fun
data.text:
We were a group of kids and adults.  Everyone had a blast (well not the 5 year old, he was overwhelmed).  Flying was easy, the instructors (we had two) were fantastic and funny.  I loved it so much I bought a return pass for more visits (it is way cheaper that way).  Each time I go it becomes easier and easier and more and more fun.  

The high fly for an extra $15 is worth it the first time for the experience.  After that it was a goal of mine to be able to go high myself (which I did on the third visit)...total flying time so far 10 minutes, in 1 to 2 minute increments.  As a first time flier, a few 1 minute increments are enough.  Your back will get tired until you build up the muscles.

Just relax your body and follow your instructors hand signals (they teach you the signals).  Make slow movments and small corrections for the best results.

Fun!

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: Thrilling experience.  The staffs were very friendly.   We will come back.  Look forward to other location close to our home in NJ.

data.title: Awesome!
data.text: My son and I went flying over Labor Day weekend and we had a wonderful time. I was a little nervous but Carlie our instructor made sure my experience was nothing but WOW! I was so impressed by the staff there, every where you looked you saw staffers with big smiles. They made everything fun, easy and a desire to come back again and again. We are definitely coming back and bringing more friends and family with us! Top Notch!!!

data.title: Jamie is the best
data.text: She solved some scheduling issues and made out experience awesome. Jsmie was profesional and courteous. She's the best!

data.title: Happiest local place!
data.text: What a great experience! This was our first visit to iFly & it was awesome. Check in was efficient, you have to make a reservation, so we just had to fill out waiver etc. It was brief. Then off we went upstairs to find a minimally populated space, with plenty of seating to watch the flyers. All of this goes off without a hitch in 30 minute increments. You get there 1 hr before, check in, watch flyers fly & smile, 30 minutes before your flight you're called for training & outfitting, then you're on. The flight instructors are fab! They smile, they encourage, they laugh. I'm telling you, it's impressive. You can see these people enjoy their jobs. I saw kids as young as 3 flying, handicapped kids being helped in to fly and flying, retirees flying, teens actually smiling & flying. As I said, happiest local place! My kid loved it, we'll go back, it's worth the $.

data.title: Amazing Flight Experience
data.text: iFly Virginia beach was an awesome experience. I really enjoyed the High Flight where my instructor took me higher than the normal level. At first I was nervous but my instructor, Nick helped me to relax and stay calm the second round. My cousin had a great experience as well. He looked like a pro and Nick did really well in helping us to look like pros. Thank you. I will be back!

data.title: Even better the 2nd Time
data.text: Had a blast once again, instructor was knowledgeable and friendly. Will continue to participate in this activity in my local area. My 12 year old daughter LOVES IT!!

data.title: Awesome - so much fun!
data.text: My daughter, her boyfriend and I went to IFly last week while we were at VA Beach.  I had been before at the IFLY Seattle.  This was just as much fun!  My daughter and her boyfriend had a blast.

data.title: Incredible Experience, Fantastic Instructor, Highlight of the Summer!!!
data.text:
Absolutely great time! I brought the family package and went with a bunch of stiffs who were all afraid of heights -my wife, 3 daughters (12-16) and my 4yr old boy. Our assigned instructor David Manuel, was incredibly helpful and guided them through the entire experience. It was completely safe, gave a realistic skydiving feel, and gave 5 people the experience of a lifetime, in a short time.
Some tips to remember... 
- If you have long hair. BE SURE to tie it up. 
- If you're scared of heights... don't fear -really! My wife is as chicken as they come with claustrophobic tendencies. She absolutely loved it. Our instructor took good care of them all
- They weren't kidding about the ages. My 4yr old isn't very brave but also had a great time

Thanks to David Manuel for the life experience at (mostly) ground level.
